entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Question] JIT/Directed/debugging/debuginfo/tester fail with DOTNET_TieredCompilation=0 on Linux #104451
  • Assertion failed `(pThread->m_StateNC & Thread::TSNC_OwnsSpinLock) == 0` #104449
    9.0.0
  • JIT build failure with clang 10 #104442
  • JIT: Spurious 0-sized diffs in smoke_tests.nativeaot.windows.arm64 #104441
  • HostFxr - calling load_assembly_and_get_function_pointer return -2146234280 #104436
  • [mono] Failure LambdaCompilerAot tests due to attempts of JIT compiling method while in aot-only mode. #104431
  • Apple mobile JIT_Directed runtime tests failures: System.DllNotFoundException: EmptyStructsLib #104430
  • Should .NET Generic Host call IHostApplicationLifetime.StopApplication for unhandled domain exceptions? #104428
  • Question around DiagnosticSource & DiagnosticListener & execution context #104427
    Future
  • [QUIC & HTTP/3] Handshake Timeout on tests #104426
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: support thread dump on `kill -3` #104425
  • Dev/Debug mode experience #104424
  • Customize bundle extract base directory within the app #104422
  • System.Numerics.Complex Parse (string s, IFormatProvider? provider) don't work #104421
  • [browser] HttpClientHandlerTest.ReadAsStreamAsync_Cancellation - No exception was thrown #104419
    9.0.0
  • AccessViolationException on LibraryImportGenerator unit test on release coreclr osx x64 Debug #104415
  • /build/gdb-Dh0pdX/gdb-12.1/gdb/jit.c:1252: internal-error: jit_event_handler: Assertion `jiter->jiter_data != nullptr' failed. #104413

Closed

  • Duplicate information in structured json logs #104409
    Future
  • [apple] TvOS/MacCatalyst/iOSSimulator X509Certificates failures during AppleCrypto interop #104161
  • [libraries-jitstress] `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests.Vectors.Vector512Tests.Vector512DoubleEqualsNonCanonicalNaNTest` fails in CI on win-x64 #104317
    9.0.0
  • Let Utf8JsonReader process input with one complete JSON document per line #33030
    9.0.0
  • EF tools install makes a strange error on UBUNTU #100539
    Future
  • [iOS][globalization][icu] Tracking issue for HybridGlobalization: Native API + ICU #80689
    9.0.0
  • [wasi] Failing test `System.Globalization.Tests.CalendarTests.TestJapaneseCalendarDateParsing` #82965
    9.0.0
  • [jitstress] JIT\Regression\JitBlue\Runtime_90423 fails with "Assertion failed '(op2 == idx) || (op2->gtEffectiveVal() == idx)' during 'Find oper order'" #103577
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] WasmTemplateTests for console failing due to truncated output #71887
    8.0.0
  • Firefox-MT: [MONO] * Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/object.c:2029, condition `klass' not met #101929
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] TIMED_OUT #104418
    9.0.0
  • Ios Maui sample app uses Chinese Simplified when Chinese Traditional is set in phone preferences #102560
  • Test failure: Expect100Continue_WaitsExpectedPeriodOfTimeBeforeSendingContent #58628
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Some AOT configuration combinations to disallow #94103
    9.0.0
  • [browser] System.Memory.Tests is taking too long on FF #103829
    9.0.0
  • [runtime-extra-platforms] tvossimulator-x64 mono failure in CultureName_Set_Invalid_ThrowsCultureNotFoundException: no exception thrown #104346
  • Potential improvements for System.Numerics.Complex #104233
  • Decide on a policy for duplicate attributes on PKCS12 values #103924
    9.0.0
  • VectorX<T>.ConditionalSelect doesn’t get optimized for const masks on non-AVX512 platforms #104001
    Future
  • Dotnet apps fail to start when run in a directory containing a backslash #75387
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove `virtual` modifier from `GetDatePart` #104456
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • Swap MetricsHandler and DiagnosticsHandler #104455
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime (second attempt) #104454
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Remove `virtual` modifier from `Calendar.CurrentEraValue` #104453
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fix "elaborated type specifier" for enum class in JIT #104450
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix size of dirent buffer on illumos #104448
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Disable tests for illumos that depend on a pre-built nethost binary #104447
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasi] enable WASMTIME_BACKTRACE_DETAILS #104446
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Have mono handle the vector as APIs that grow or shrink the vector type #104445
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [QUIC] Fixed some tests leaking unobserved exceptions #104444
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [iOS][non-icu] Clean up ICU related files from runtime pack #104443
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Handle top-level UseSystemLibs argument from the VMR #104440
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Skip old promotion for retbuf defined locals #104439
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Disable old promotion for structs with significant padding #104438
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for reverse pinvoke argument lowering #104437
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono
  • In Dns.RunAsync calls AfterResolution when canceled #104435
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix a typo in browser-bench wasm app #104434
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [Apple] Disable EmptyStructs tests for apple mobile due to missing support for native libraries #104433
    arch-arm64, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos
  • JIT: Remove `CallArg::m_tmpNum` #104429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix cancelability of DNS queries #104420
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #104417
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Use basic forwarder in down-level support if any parameters can't be marshalled #104416
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix GetStaticsBases #104412
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Enable "Allocate on stack" for NAOT/R2R #104411
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [HttpClientFactory] Do not log query string by default #103769
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Revert "Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime" #104414
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Extract StructSegments to its own file #104432
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix certificate test failures on iOS(-likes) #104410
    area-System.Security
  • Use the maskBaseType when consuming a mask directly as part of KORTEST #104364
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve build error on systems that have a 32-bit time_t #104368
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Add Utf8JsonReader.AllowMultipleValues and related APIs. #104328
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Small clean up in gtMarkAddrMode #104387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove uses of CLRJIT_AZ_KEY/clrjit_key1 from SPMI #104164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable `WasmTemplateTests` #104357
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-Build-mono
  • [wasi] Implement TODO in mono-threads-wasi.S #101337
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Disallow not useful configuration combinations #104149
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [browser] default WasmDebugLevel to 0 for tests #104361
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add a disabled-by-default implementation of strength reduction #104243
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS][HybridGlobalization] Disable CultureName_Set_Invalid_ThrowsCultureNotFoundException test #104382
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Arm64/Sve: Do not mark *Prefetch* APIs as MEMORY_LOAD #104396
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make CertLoader reject duplicate attributes #104344
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • fix the size passed to grow_heap_segment from loh_allocate_in_condemned #103998
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add support for other same size vector bitcasts to Mono #104309
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Optimize VectorX<T>.ConditionalSelect for constant masks #104092
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Enable TLS on linux/arm64 only for static resolver #104408
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Reimplement LINQ ToList using SegmentedArrayBuilder to reduce allocations #104365
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Add nativeaot support on LoongArch64. #103889
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2488849 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Improve `JsonNode.DeepEquals` numeric equality. #104255
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Reduce allocations in Quic/HTTP3 #104394
    area-System.Net.Quic, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Transform multi-reg args to FIELD_LIST in physical promotion #104370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 3: Remove zlib and zlib-intel source code and license mentions #104399
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO.Compression
  • [wasi] upgrade to WASIp2 + wasi:http #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift struct lowering in direct P/Invoke returns #104389
    arch-arm64, arch-x64, area-Codegen-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [Android] Resolve Android-specific System.Net.Security active issues #104352
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Only build applicable build Tasks when building the repo #104226
    area-Infrastructure
  • [RISC-V] Fix System.Net.Sockets.Tests on Qemu #104094
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Test HybridGlobalization with AOT on CI #104027
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasi] sdk22 path #104379
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Improve performance of interface method resolution in ILC #103066
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Don't use SyncTextWriter in single-threaded wasm builds #101221
    arch-wasm
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix some ssize_t -> handle casts #104404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add standard tags to HttpClient native trace instrumentation #104251
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [RISC-V] JIT: pass structs according to floating-point calling convention properly #104237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [QUIC&H/3] QuicConnection handshake timeout #104358
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Refactor WinHttpHandler test to use LoopbackServer.CreateClientAndServer #104400
    area-System.Net
  • [RISC-V] Fix coreclr test coreroot_determinism.sh #104140
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow LARGE_REGION_FACTOR to be configurable #104403
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary endianness dependent logic #104332
    area-System.Memory
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Port yield normalization from CoreCLR to Native AOT #103675
    area-System.Threading
  • Do not encode safe points with -1 offset. #104336
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update EOL versions (8.0-staging) #103393
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • RunWithFakeThreshold with DisableParallelization #103423
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Implement various other simple vector APIs from 93513 #103837
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-04

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [9.0.100-alpha.1.24070.3] dotnet tool install command get access deny message #38183
    9.0.1xx

Updated

  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • zsh: command not found: dotnet on Mac m1 #22910
  • .NET6 - MSB4236: The SDK 'Microsoft.NET.Sdk' specified could not be found #23311
    Discussion
  • Permission Denied or Access Denied when running a global dotnet tool #41947

PullRequests

Created

  • ref: remove unused file #41987

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41985
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Pass along top-level UseSystemLibs option to runtime #41984

    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #41969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add feature switch for StackTraceSupport #41873
  • [main] Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #41974
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41967
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41929
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

  • Use PackageDownload in torn builds #41951

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35104.04 #74270
  • empty string vs. null string #74126
    Backlog

Updated

  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.workspaces.workspacesnetcore.projectproperties (vs2022) #64672
    Backlog
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.csharp.csharperrorlistnetcore.errorlist #61367
    17.6 P3
  • Implement optimizations for constructing collections from collection literals #68785
    17.9
  • Allow `MemberNotNull` on constructors #71526
    Backlog
  • Apply NotNullIfNotNull with multiple arguments #43906

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove double array allocation in SemanticTokens #74271
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge changes from a single DidChange notification #74268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Optimize codegen for collections expression of single spread of `ReadOnlySpan` for collection builder emit strategy #73102
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged
  • Fix modification of readonly locals through ref fields #74255
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove (already disabled) command handlers related to 'add suppression' menu command. #74266
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Overload Resolution Priority #74190
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Improve performance of SourceText.LineInfo indexer. #74267
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter, updates #56629
  • Perf improvement: mvc #56628
  • InvalidOperationException: EditForm requires either a Model parameter, or an EditContext parameter ... - Caused by Using a Poco in different assembly that has public fields instead of auto-properties #56627
  • SignInManager.ValidateTwoFactorSecurityStampAsync is incorrectly passing userName to FindByIdAsync #56625
  • Question: How to detect whether the current app is a normal ASP.NET Core application or a Blazor app? #56633
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #56624
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_dapper, single_query #56623
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef #56622
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes, fortunes_dapper #56621
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json, mvc #56620
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, multiple_queries #56619

Closed

  • EditForm that is placed on an interactive server page does not trigger submit handler. #56634
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #56611
  • Authentication for static files || OpenIDConnect || BlazoreServer App || Dotnetcore 8 #55057
  • Stop injecting "_framework/aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js" into the body of every generated web page of an asp.net core app. #55734
  • User is authenticated false, when using multiple cookie authentications #56540
  • This is a dup of https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/issues/23195 which was closed due to inactivity. It does provide a workaround though #56337
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #56612
  • Add named pipes methods to Kestrel configuration loader #56565
  • Add named pipes methods to Kestrel configuration loader #54314
  • Request to Add System.Range Extension Support #56618
  • OpenAPI Throws `System.ArgumentNullException` Inside Docker #56309

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Bundle runtime .MSI's instead of .exe's #56632
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Chain runtime .Msi's instead of .Exe's in hosting bundle #56631
    area-infrastructure
  • Removing unsafe parts of Decode method in QueryStringEnumerable #56630
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • Add named pipes methods to Kestrel configuration loader #56563
    area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Add test for the order of activity and metrics with HTTP requests #56592
    area-hosting, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `1d17ea1` #56232
    area-infrastructure
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.7.24351.1 #56546
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/8.0] Chain runtime .Msi's instead of .Exe's in hosting bundle #56459
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Perf: ReasonPhrases as Array instead of Dictionary #56304
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Use Ascii.ToUtf16 in StringUtilities #56578
    area-networking
  • Optimize RouteTableFactory.DetectAmbiguous routes #56415
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking
  • Add disable HTTP metrics endpoint metadata #56036
    area-hosting
  • Use Convert.ToHexStringLower() #56235
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security, 9.0-preview7
  • Remove LINQ usage from OpenAPI comparers #56599
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Add CreateNamedPipeServerStream to named pipes options #56567
    area-networking
  • Do not close connection for http1.0 when client request connection keep-alive #56558
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Support IAsyncEnumerable<T> and ChannelReader<T> with ValueTypes in SignalR native AOT #56583
    area-signalr

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [test failure] SOS.WebApp3 fails on Alpine with VerifyOutput: no last command output or debugger exited unexpectedly: \s*Statistics:\s+ #4755

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] SwipeView: Parent scrolling is not reenabled after cancelled swipe #23441
  • [iOS, Preview 4 and 5] iOS build fails with MessagingRemoteException in UnpackLibraryResources when connected to Mac #23440
  • Items added to ObservableCollection do not appear in a bound stack layout inside a scroll view #23439
  • [iOS] Automatic scroll to Editor control covers screen from top #23438
  • [Only Windows] InputTransparent=True makes view transparent #23436
  • [iOS] CollectionView's height does not include measured height of Header and Footer to size of Content #23435
  • DatePicker switches date format to English #23431
  • [Android, 9.0 Preview 5] Release configuration build results in a malfunctioning app (Preview 5 debug and Preview 4 release configurations work fine). #23430
  • [MacCatalyst] IFrame to external URL opens in external browser, despite mitigation strategies [Blazor Hybrid] #23429
  • iOS app hangs indefinitely (possibly related to scrollview) #23427
  • [Android, .NET 9.0 Preview 5] Build process randomly lefts out AndroidAsset files in Platforms/Android subdirectory #23426
  • BackButtonBehavior IsVisible="False" does not hide the back button on iOS #23424
  • [Android] App crash when using a binding value that exceeds Entry max length #23423
  • [Android] native crash by lib64/libhwui.so #23421

Closed

  • [Windows] Window Memory Leak #22973
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • iOS CarouselView crashes with "MauiContext should have been set on parent." #23278
    .NET 8 SR7
  • NullReferenceException in UpdateLeftBarButtonItem #14801
    Backlog
  • `Element`: NRE by accessing `RealParent` #23320
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Xamarin framework Support for net8.0-ios? #23434
  • [Blazor Hybrid] `UseMaui` in Razor Class Library breaks wwwroot paths #23270
  • CollectionView Selection Issue on Android #23402
  • Image IsVisible Binding does not work when Shadow applied #23344
  • InputTransparent="true" on a Layout breaks child controls on Android #22289
    Backlog
  • Android does not update visibility of a visual element if it has a Shadow #20264
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] SwipeView: Fix reenabling parent scrolling after cancelled swipe #23442
    community ✨
  • [SG] Disable emitting generated sources #23437

Merged

  • [windows] fix memory leak in `MauiWinUIWindow` #23327
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, memory-leak 💦
  • Add UITest.Analyzers to VS Code Solution #23433
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • If PlatformView has been removed use index #23408
  • Add Flaky UI Test category #23432
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Android: Ensure fragment has not been disposed while updating left bar button #23416
    community ✨
  • `Element`: NRE by accessing `RealParent` - fix #23405
    community ✨
  • Add missing UI Test category to fix main build #23428
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Android] InputTransparent="true" on a Layout breaks child controls - Fix #22345
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • [tests] Analyzer / code fix provider for UITest [Test] without [Category] #23287
    area-infrastructure, area-testing

Updated

  • [iOS] Crash upon resuming the app - fix #23360
    area-core-lifecycle, platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, community ✨, migration-compatibility
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
  • Fire Navigation Events on Root Window Page #23420
  • [Windows] Respect `ClearButtonVisibility = ClearButtonVisibility.Never` for `<Entry>`s #23158
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Binding SG] Add an API for creating instances of TypedBinding #23239
    area-xaml, .NET 9 Planning
  • [android]: ModalContainer Destroy commit allowing state loss #23400
    community ✨
  • Remove duplicated CarV/ColV galleries #23190
    area-infrastructure
  • Add MSBuild glob for Windows Assets #23314
    area-single-project, platform/windows 🪟
  • [Binding SG] Dogfood binding source generator in the MAUI codebase #23393
  • Run UI tests per groups of categories in CI #22609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-infrastructure
  • Fixing regression in Picker behavior in 8.0.60 #23369
    community ✨
  • Support the new RIDs on WinUI #23247
    area-infrastructure
  • Make sure resizetized image files are writable #23412
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Reverse engineering (scaffolding) problem #34162
  • Migration drops non-existent column for model with owned base class but non-owned inherited class #34161
  • OwnedType does not work with type configured with .ToSqlQuery #34160
  • Query: take indexes into account in optimizations #34159
  • Utilizing the new `CreateVersion7` API for `ValueGeneratedOnAdd` #34158
  • Cosmos: Reimplement ReadItem via its own expression type again #34157
    Backlog
  • Allow passing in options to IDbContextFactory.CreateDbContext #34156

Closed

  • Cosmos: Leverage complete discriminator mapping #20268
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Cosmos: Stop generating discriminator clause when not needed #34145
  • Some minor Cosmos cleanup #34155
  • Pack of minor Cosmos changes #34143

Updated

  • Implement `IS [NOT] DISTINCT FROM` translation #34048
  • Use null propagation to optimize away `IS NOT NULL` checks #34127
  • Add UnsafeAccessor support for generic types #34146
